item.title: Experience
item.description: Autonomous Robots Lab, University of Nevada, Reno Undergraduate Research Intern. [July 2020 - Present] Working on motion planning of quadrotors which can be deployed in geometrically constrained enviroments, under the guidance of Prof.

item.title: Omnibase
item.description: Due to the COVID-19, all of us were restricted to our homes. So, testing the algorithms on an actual robot was close to impossible.

item.title: Project Kratos
item.description: Developed the control sub-system of a rover for the Indian Rover Chanllenge, 2020. Worked on the design of the robotic manipulator on the rover.

item.title: Trotbot
item.description: Trotbot is a robot designed to serve as a delivery robot in an indoor environment. The deliverables will be placed inside the container.

item.title: When You Have Too Much to Do
MAVROS Controllers
item.description: Developed some controllers for a delivery drone project using the PX4. The controllers were tested on an agent in Gazebo.

item.title: Fall Detection System
item.description: Developed a fall detection system using STM-32F103. Used MPU-6050 to get the inertial measurements. Data was sent to an app using a bluetooth module.

item.title: BLE for access control
item.description: Worked on this project during my summer internship at Smart-i Electronics Systems, Pune. Project Mentor: Siddesh Madiwale Here are some highlights of the project:
